sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"思想，观点，观念"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: idea, concept, conception, thought, notion, impression
means: idea ： 最普通常用词，几乎适用于任何方面的思维活动。
concept ： 指从众多实例中通过概括、归纳而形成的对事物本质、全貌及其内部联系的概念或看法。
conception ： 通常指个人或一些人所持有的具体概念或念头，也可指概念的形成过程，含一定的想象和感情色彩意味。
thought ： 指以推理、思考等智力活动为基础的心理思维活动及其结果。
notion ： 指的是一种模糊的，变化的莫测的想法，无可靠的基础，未经深思熟虑的观点。
impression ： 指外部刺激在思想中所产生的印象。

word_mean: 印模：用软的后来变硬的塑料接触某一物体并施以一定程度的压力而制作出来的某一物体的阴模或阳模，如牙印模
印象，影响：外在的一些刺激给精神、身体或感官造成的印象或影响

sentence.Network_en: My visit to India in 1986 left an indelible impression on me.
sentence.Network_cn: 1986年的印度之行给我留下了难忘的印象。

sentence.Network_en: The choice was meant to create an impression of party unity.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个选择意在给人一种党内团结的印象。

sentence.Network_en: There was a general impression that tomorrow meant a fresh start.
sentence.Network_cn: 普遍的感觉是明天意味着一个新的开始。

jx.jx_en_mean: believing, mistakenly or on the basis of little evidence, that something is the case

lj.lj_ly: he was under the impression that they had become friends.
lj.lj_ls: 他依稀觉得他们已经是朋友了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin impressio(n-), from impress- 'pressed in', from the verb imprimere (see imprint)

entry.def: Your impression of a person or thing is what you think they are like, usually after having seen or heard them. Your impression of a situation is what you think is going on.

example.ex: What were your first impressions of college?...
example.tran: 你对大学的第一印象是什么？

example.ex: My impression is that they are totally out of control...
example.tran: 我的感觉是它们完全失去了控制。

entry.def: If someone gives you a particular impression, they cause you to believe that something is the case, often when it is not.

example.ex: I don't want to give the impression that I'm running away from the charges...
example.tran: 我不想给人一种我在逃避指控的感觉。

example.ex: He cleverly inserted mirrors above the window to create an impression of space.
example.tran: 他巧妙地在窗子上面镶嵌了几面镜子，以营造一种空间感。

entry.def: An impression is an amusing imitation of someone's behaviour or way of talking, usually someone well-known.

example.ex: He did impressions of Sean Connery and James Mason.
example.tran: 他对肖恩·康纳利和詹姆斯·梅森进行了滑稽模仿。

entry.def: An impression of an object is a mark or outline that it has left after being pressed hard onto a surface.

example.ex: ...the world's oldest fossil impressions of plant life.
example.tran: 世界上最古老的植物化石印痕

entry.def: If someone or something makes an impression, they have a strong effect on people or a situation.

example.ex: He has told me his plans and he's made a good impression on me...
example.tran: 他告诉了我他的计划,给我留下了一个好印象。

example.ex: The aid coming in has made no impression on the horrific death rates.
example.tran: 逐渐到达的救援对可怕的死亡率并没有起到什么作用。

entry.def: If you are under the impression that something is the case, you believe that it is the case, usually when it is not actually the case.

example.ex: He had apparently been under the impression that a military coup was in progress.
example.tran: 他显然以为一场军事政变正在酝酿中。

means.word_mean: 1. a vague idea in which some confidence is placed;

sentences.sentence: "what are your feelings about the crisis?"
"it strengthened my belief in his sincerity"
"I had a feeling that she was lying"
"I wanted to create an impression of success"
"she retained that bold effect in her reproductions of the original painting"

means.word_mean: 3. a clear and telling mental image;

sentences.sentence: "he described his mental picture of his assailant"
"he had no clear picture of himself or his world"
"the events left a permanent impression in his mind"

means.word_mean: 4. a concavity in a surface produced by pressing;

sentences.sentence: "he left the impression of his fingers in the soft mud"

means.word_mean: 5. a symbol that is the result of printing;

sentences.sentence: "he put his stamp on the envelope"

means.word_mean: 6. all the copies of a work printed at one time;

sentences.sentence: "they ran off an initial printing of 2000 copies"

means.word_mean: 7. (dentistry) an imprint of the teeth and gums in wax or plaster;

sentences.sentence: "the dentist took an impression for use in preparing an inlay"

means.word_mean: 8. an impressionistic portrayal of a person;

sentences.sentence: "he did a funny impression of a politician"

means.word_mean: 9. the act of pressing one thing on or into the surface of another;

sentences.sentence: "he watched the impression of the seal on the hot wax"

auth_sentence.content: Their Gallops EP left an immediate, hook-laden impression.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their Gallops EP left an immediate, hook-laden impression.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their Gallops EP left an immediate, hook-laden impression.

auth_sentence.res_content: I'm starting to get that impression, sir.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm starting to get that impression, sir.

auth_sentence.content: She was but a transient impression, half forgotten.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was but a transient impression, half forgotten.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was but a transient impression, half forgotten.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可压缩的, 可压榨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compress[v.压缩]+ible能……的→adj.可压缩的, 可压榨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depress[v.压制,压抑]+ed……的→adj.沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人深刻印象的,感人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impress印象,引人注目+ive……的→adj.给人深刻印象的,感人的
press挤压+ing……的→adj.急迫的
compress[v.压缩]+ion表名词→n.压缩,压紧,浓缩
depress[v.压制,压抑]+ion表名词→n.消沉;不景气萧条期
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
stems_affixes.word_buile: express表达,表示+ion→n.表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
impress印象,引人注目+ion表名词→n.印象,感想;盖印,压痕
oppress[v.压迫,压制]+ion表名词→n.压迫

stems_affixes.value_cn: 压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
stems_affixes.word_buile: press挤压+ure表名词→n.压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
suppress[v.镇压,压制]+ion表名词→n.镇压,压制
press挤压→n.&n.&v.压, 按
com一起+press压→一起压→压缩
de向下+press压→向下压→压制→情绪低下
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达
im进+press挤压→压进去→盖印→印入头脑→留下印象
op加强动作+press挤压→拼命压→压迫
re回+press挤压→压回去
sup下+press压→压下去

Sentence.sentence: I hope to make a good impression on your family.
The man has left a good impression on her family
Walk into a class today, however, and you'll get a completely different impression.

sentences.en: She made a good impression on his mother.
sentences.cn: 她给他母亲留下了很好的印象。

means.word_mean: 想法, 看法, 感觉

sentences.en: I had the distinct impression that I was being followed.
sentences.cn: 我清楚地感觉到有人跟踪我。

sentences.en: He did a brilliant impression of the President.
sentences.cn: 他对总统作了逼真的滑稽模仿。

sentences.en: There are the impressions of shoes in the mud.
Seven impressions of the novel have been sold out.
sentences.cn: 这本小说印了七次都卖光了。

jushi.english: There are the impressions of shoes in the mud.
He did a brilliant impression of the president.
jushi.chinese: 他对总统作了逼真的滑稽模仿。

jushi.english: Seven impressions of the novel have been sold out.
jushi.chinese: 这本小说印了七次,都卖光了。
